were sparse events for ingrown nail claims in the outpatient cohort.eTable 4. Association of ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy on in-hospital mortality or discharge to hospice care in COVID-19 inpatient cohort. eFigure 3: Distribution of individuals in the outpatient and inpatient cohorts. (A) SARS-CoV-2 test geographic distribution: number of tests by state. Patients in 44 states were included based on a positive test. (B) COVID-19 Inpatient case distribution: number of inpatient cases by state. COVID-19 hospitalizations included in the study are represented in 47 states.Number of COVID−19 Tests Conducted by States of Test SitesNumber of COVID−19 Inpatient Cases by State of Hospitals
